title: Host a Q&A on Social Media
description: Following a major investigation, the lead reporter hosts a live Q&A session on Twitter to answer audience questions.

tasks.description: Announce the Q&A session in advance to gather questions from the audience.
tasks.expected_outcome: A pool of questions is ready before the event starts.

tasks.description: During the live session, monitor incoming questions and select the most relevant ones to answer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent effectively filters and prioritizes questions.

tasks.description: Provide clear and concise answers to the selected questions.
tasks.expected_outcome: The audience's questions are answered satisfactorily.
